ygData.subject: Re: Re: Location of teleports
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have seen the teleport pyramid before.  If you actually know how to get the spell that takes you there, please tell me.  I would love to have a teleport
ygData.messageBody:
> FYI there is a teleport in south ro

I have seen the teleport pyramid before. If you actually know how to get
the spell that takes you there, please tell me. I would love to have a
teleport there, but to date I have never seen the actual spell.



Also, regarding the other question about the Cazic-Thule gate, if you go
strait west from the teleport pyramid, you will come to the door to
courtyard. The path curves a bit, but go as close to strait west as
possible, and you should be able to find your way out.

-Shadowwalker
